text: Cea mi hen dxk hrux wa thæ cring xallxhˌ thrng hlang nalng ma cak fak fa læw thrng hı man hil sum lng pi nı phændin pen tana dwy na nan thrng hı phuch ngxk xxk ma hlay si læw man k ca heiywhæng dangnan cea ca hen man klay pen si heluxng læw phraxngkh thrng thahı man pen sesʹ pen chin thæcring nı kar nan yxm pen khx teuxnsti kæ phu mi stipayya thanghlay
